title: Avas Grateful Bears
description: A Children's Picture Book. Looking for a special way to connect with his granddaughter, Ava's grandfather secretly places a large box under the Christmas tree. Within that box is a collection of over 100 Grateful Dead Bears. Over the next seven years, the connection that occurs between granddaughter, grandfather and that magical collection of bears takes all of them on a special journey together. A grateful journey.
author: Douglas P. Bratt
